entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
